lead_paragraph: The 32-year-old victim was attacked at the West Farms Square-East Tremont Avenue subway station, the latest in a recent spate of slashings in New York.

headline.print_headline: Man Is Slashed at Bronx Subway Station After an Argument
headline.main: Man Is Slashed in the Face at a Bronx Subway Station After an Argument

snippet: The 32-year-old victim was attacked at the West Farms Square-East Tremont Avenue subway station, the latest in a recent spate of slashings in New York.
abstract: Unidentified man recovers from face slashing that occurred in West Farms Square-East Tremont Avenue subway station after arguing with assailants prior to attack; authorities believe attack is unrelated to recent crime surge involving slashings in New York City area.
